vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, only mentioned at Gen.26.34;
daughter of: Beeri (H0882); married to Esau (H6215)
§ Judith = "Jewess" or "praised"
the daughter of Beeri the Hittite and wife of Esau
vocabInfos._es_Definition: (1)   hebreo; (2)   hija de Beerí; esposa de Esaú
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
猶滴 这个陰性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "猶太女人"
比利的女兒, 比利是以掃的妻子且是赫人 (創 26:34)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
犹滴 这个阴性专有名词在原文的意思是 "犹太女人"
比利的女儿, 比利是以扫的妻子且是赫人 (创 26:34)
